sentences.english: This article also has compared them with other nationalities to explore the trait of Hui's mandible.

sentences.english: Chapter Three is a retrospect of the historical backdrop of the changes.
sentences.chinese: 第三章阐述了西北回族宴席曲流变的历史文化背景。

sentences.english: It is under the imperial civil examination system that Hui people learned Han culture.
sentences.chinese: 回族对汉文化的学习基本上是在科举制下进行的。

sentences.english: Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region is one of the autonomous regions of the five national minority in China.
sentences.chinese: 宁夏回族自治区是中国五个少数民族自治区之一。

sentences.english: So that it likely is a artistic circumstantial evidence of the history of suffering of Yunnan Hui.
sentences.chinese: 因此，它很可以成为云南回族受难史的一个艺术旁证。

sentences.english: Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region was founded in 1958.
sentences.chinese: 宁夏回族自治区成立于1958年。

sentences.english: Linxia Hui autonomous prefectures are Hui ethnic community of Gansu province.

sentences.english: Since the establishment of the town of Jinling Hui So far, the rapid development of all aspects of the rights and interests.
sentences.chinese: 金岭回族镇自从建立至今，各方面权益发展迅速。

sentences.english: Blade to help AHu a helping hand, save the hui people.
sentences.chinese: 刀锋想助阿虎一臂之力，救回族人。

sentences.english: Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region is briefly named Ning, with Yinchuan as its provincial seat.
sentences.chinese: 宁夏回族自治区，简称宁，首府是银川。

sentences.english: In cultural recognition, the people of Hui represent a very obious character of the combination of the two cultures.
sentences.chinese: 回族在文化认同上表现了极强的两种文化结合的特点。

sentences.english: A sandstorm and temperature drops were also reported in Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region.
